Posts.Content: Jul 28, 2011 08:18PM computermouse wrote: can i ask a dumb question? is that where they put monitors on your arm and measure the lymphatic flow? I had that for the first time the other day and was blown away when told that my lymphatic flow is normal and that maybe I have some other type of post-mastectomy edema (ie not lymph related), brought on by scar tissue and blockages. I had never heard that there could be other categories of arm swelling for women with breast cance.r....
